title: Adam Schiff
deleted: [[Matt Gaetz]] filled an ethics complaint against Schiff accusing him of violating house rules regarding comments he made during the [[First impeachment of Donald Trump]].<ref>{{Cite web|last=Zilbermints|first=Regina|date=2019-10-30|title=GOP Rep. Gaetz calls for ethics investigation into Schiff|url=https://thehill.com/homenews/house/468142-gop-lawmaker-calls-for-ethics-investigation-into-schiff|access-date=2021-09-19|website=TheHill|language=en}}</ref>

[[Kevin McCarthy (California politician)|Kevin McCarthy]], [[Kellyanne Conway]], and [[Mike Turner]] called for Schiff to resign citing him misleading the public when he said that there was more than circumstantial evidence that Trump colluded with Russia.<ref>{{Cite web|title=Schiff targeted by GOP after Mueller probe ends: 'Dishonest.' 'Off the rails.'|url=https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/donald-trump/schiff-targeted-gop-after-mueller-probe-ends-dishonest-rails-n987471|access-date=2021-09-19|website=NBC News|language=en}}</ref>

National intelligence director [[John Ratcliffe (American politician)|John Ratcliffe]] criticized Schiff for saying that the [[Hunter Biden]] laptop was part of a smear campaign against [[Joe Biden]] and saying this was supported by the intelligence community. Despite Ratcliffe saying he had shared no such intelligence with Schiff.<ref>{{Cite web|date=2021-08-13|title=Hunter Biden emails no Russia disinformation campaign, DNI John Ratcliffe says|url=https://apnews.com/article/joe-biden-europe-business-russia-campaigns-dba1f6d74f96ca2192eca627877ec108|access-date=2021-09-19|website=AP NEWS|language=en}}</ref>

title: Adam Schiff
deleted: Schiff is [[vegan]].<ref>{{cite journal |last= Stuart |first= Tessa |title= How the House Intelligence Committee Collapsed on Adam Schiff |journal= [[Rolling Stone]] |date= May 24, 2018 |access-date= November 8, 2018 |url= https://www.rollingstone.com/politics/politics-features/how-the-house-intelligence-committee-collapsed-on-adam-schiff-627831/ |quote= But Schiff – mild-mannered, judicious, vegan – has ... |archive-url= https://web.archive.org/web/20181109070958/https://www.rollingstone.com/politics/politics-features/how-the-house-intelligence-committee-collapsed-on-adam-schiff-627831/ |archive-date= November 9, 2018 |url-status= live }}</ref>
